Message.Msg: Oooooooh, really? Wow, Terrel that is fascinating! I have a suggestion for a place or two you can shove a load of explosives made from readily available substances. What sort of a dumba+s cracker name is "Terrel" anyway?

It's "I couldn't care less". Frequent, excusable mistake, but as the mistakes pile up in your posts they diminish the impact and legitimacy of whatever message it is you think you're trying to get across, which, in many cases, I'm not convinced anyone other than you understands or cares about. A 4 y/o dog is not a "puppy"; you should try to keep both it and yourself out of the middle of the road no matter what you are each doing with your respective or conjoined "parts".

Ah, Terrel, there's the old Christian spirit. Your "Big Brother" would be so proud of you. You just spew love and Christian charity don't you? You're hell bound, my hypocrite friend, hell bound and you will go ALONE, terribly alone. Alone and crying for your mommy and Marjorie. And you are going soon!
He's not silly. He's a vile, hateful, lying old hypocrite.
Now come on jon2retard, you know the other alias is robfisk. How's the Prius?
He's a old washed up reich-winger that even Viagra doesn't work for him, so he takes his frustrations out on the world.
Hey robfisk, where's the proof our President refused to send help? Just another out right lie, by a FOX drone.

Republicans Aren't the Only Gun-Control Obstacle By Beth Reinhard This article is on Yahoo, all you Democrat supporters need to read it. They are as guilty of playing politics with guns rules as anyone. It is only their favorite subject when there is a ‘crisis’.

Message.Title: ricky
Message.Msg: "We know. You would have let Detroit fail. How much do you think that would have cost? More than $5 billion, that's for sure." This from the guy who is forever preaching that everything will be just fine if we all just will pay for our stuff. It seems ricky's messaging is clashing.

Message.Title: Someone slipped up!
Message.Msg: They have been putting my E-Mail address into hands of groups I'm not interested in. Since I only use two boards it is either this or the other one. But, I got their IP address and will use it to locate them. Sayonara stupid.

According to people in the White House "Ready Room" the Kenyan sat and watched in real time the attack on the safe house (not a consulate) and did nothing. My personal belief is that they hung him out to dry because he knew too much. He had been instrumental in arming those that killed Khadaffi and was trying to round up heavy weapons for shipment to Al Queda in Syria.
Another lying #$%$ comment. That's all you reich-wingers got. I guess you were alright with Bush/Cheney lying to you about the non existant WMD's?

There I was with Crapo and one of us had to do the thinking. It was up to me because Crapo was well, Crapo. So I cooked up this everybody is at fault except the NRA that bought off the politicians to have machine guns in the hands of the mentally ill.
